snippet.title: Mining Mechs - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Mining Mechs on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1603180/Mining_Mechs/

Unleash your inner miner as you commandeer a high-tech Mining Mech! Mine for valuable resources and upgrade your mech for even bigger hauls as you explore the underground. Fun to play alone or with up to 7 friends in online co-op multiplayer!
